resources.string: NCBSinfo is an open source and free app.
You will get suggestions and tips here.
Now you can add your own transport route.
You can sync all your preferences and routes to our server by signing in into your free NCBSinfo account.
Click on favorite icon in front of route name to make it default. Favorite route will be shown on the home screen as soon as you open the app.
Just swipe on any blank space on the home page to navigate between multiple routes.
Click on \'All Trips\' button to check all the available trips in the current route.
